gw.api.financials

Class ReserveWizardHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.AbstractPageHelperImpl
      • gw.api.financials.TransactionWizardHelper
        • gw.api.financials.ReserveWizardHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageHelper

    public class ReserveWizardHelper
extends TransactionWizardHelper
    This class provides helpful methods for the NewReserveSet page. Subtype of TransactionWizardHelper.

      • createReserveWizardHelper

      • getReservesUIMode

        public static java.lang.String getReservesUIMode()
        Indicates which mode the reserves ui should be in, based on the Server configuration. See UIMODE_SETBYNEWTOTALINCURRED and UIMODE_SETBYNEWAVAILABLERESERVES.

      • getInitialNewReservingAmount

        protected IMoney getInitialNewReservingAmount(Transaction transaction)
        Description copied from class: TransactionWizardHelper
        The initial amount displayed in the NewAmount column. i.e. Base+Pending or Base. Must not return null.
        Specified by:
        getInitialNewReservingAmount in class TransactionWizardHelper

      • getOriginalReserve

        public Reserve getOriginalReserve()
        Original single reserve line this page displayed, if the user got to the page by clicking Edit on the reserve transaction detail page.

      • setOriginalReserve

        public void setOriginalReserve(Reserve originalReserve)

      • isShowAllButtonVisible

        public boolean isShowAllButtonVisible()
        Whether to enable the Show All button. If there is one or more new blank line(s) added to the ListView (i.e. FullyEditable transaction), it won't refresh the LV from the underlying model, so this returns false.

      • setShowAllButtonVisible

        public void setShowAllButtonVisible(boolean showAllButtonVisible)

      • getShowAllTooltip

        public java.lang.String getShowAllTooltip()
        Localized ToolTip text based on enabled state of ShowAll button.

      • isShowGroupButtonVisible

        public boolean isShowGroupButtonVisible()
        Whether to enable the Show Group button, which loads the other reserves in the currently displayed reserve's TransactionSet. This only works when there is one Reserve in the LV (see OriginalReserve). If there is one or more new blank line(s) added to the ListView, the LV will not be refreshed from the underlying model, so this returns false.

      • setShowGroupButtonVisible

        public void setShowGroupButtonVisible(boolean showGroupButtonVisible)

      • getShowGroupTooltip

        public java.lang.String getShowGroupTooltip()
        Localized ToolTip text based on enabled state of ShowGroup button.

      • showGroup

        public void showGroup()
        Called when the Show Group button is clicked. Loads transactions from the Original Reserve's TransactionSet.

      • showAll

        public void showAll()
        Called when the Show All button is clicked. Loads all reserves lines set for this claim.

      • getFilterText

        public java.lang.String getFilterText()
        Localized text indicating filter applied to the list of reserve lines.

      • findPendingApprovalTransactionsOnReserveLine

        protected java.util.List<Transaction> findPendingApprovalTransactionsOnReserveLine(Transaction transaction)
        Description copied from class: TransactionWizardHelper
        Retrieves the Reserves with status of Pending-Approval that are related to the indicated reserve. By related, it is meant that there is a match of Exposure, CostType and CostCategory.

        Specified by:
        findPendingApprovalTransactionsOnReserveLine in class TransactionWizardHelper
        Returns:
        array of related pending-approval Reserve entities

      • initializeTransactionSet

        public void initializeTransactionSet(Claim claim)
        Creates the new ReserveSet any new reserves will belong to.
        Specified by:
        initializeTransactionSet in class TransactionWizardHelper

      • updateTransactionSet

        public void updateTransactionSet(Claim claim,
                                 Reserve reserveToEdit,
                                 Exposure exposure,
                                 CostType costType,
                                 CostCategory costCategory,
                                 Currency reservingCurrency)
        Based on the args passed to the Page, load the appropriate Reserves into the new ReserveSet, wrap each reserve in a TransactionEditWrapper, and add to the list of transaction wrappers, which is what the LV actually displays.
